document_data.mainbody:
Boesild Aerasum√© was a half-elf fighter and mage of Silverymoon. He was the eighth son of Alustriel Silverhand. He was known for being the most pragmatic of her sons.
By 1370 DR, Boesild was also the Moonstars regional agent for Luruar and the Evermoors region. He was the only one of Alustriels children who got on well with Khelben Arunsun the rest only just endured him for the sake of their mother.
